item.title: jQuery | SlideShow
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Sibor, post:7, topic:497118”]If you don’t believe me, look it up on google. jQuery was debated between a JavaScript Library and a FrameWork. the web developers that are know more than ANYONE on this forum, say it’s a JavaScript Library.

jQuery: The Write Less, Do More, JavaScript Library.[/quote]
Well that has nothing to do with this at all. You said you were fluent in jQuery, but you’re not from what we’ve seen so you decided to prove that my point from another thread was correct? We were saying that jQuery is a js lib all along lol…

item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Sibor:

I know jQuery fluently, as you’ve already seen.

Umm… not from what I’ve seen or anyone else here. We’ve seen you write a total of around 15 lines of jQuery, both used in the creation of very simple things. Not fluent in my opinion.

Also, Milkman is more qualified than me in website development on paper, I might know more than him and know different aspects but on paper he’s actually the better website developer, so if I was you I’d take what he says to be correct.

item.title: jQuery | SlideShow
item.dc:creator: @Sibor Sibor
item.description:
@Sibor wrote:

Hello there, moparscape community.

Today, I am releasing my little jQuery slideshow script. Everything is 100% made by me besides two plugins.

CSS Code:

/*
	@Author: Robby;
*/
#base{
	width: 300px;
	margin: 0px auto;
}
#slideshow{
	float: left;
	width: 100px;
	margin: 0px auto;
}
#slideshow img{
	background-color: #f0f0f0;
	padding: 10px;
	width: 100px;
	height: 100px;
}
#prev{
	float: left;
	padding-top: 30px;
	width: 64px;
}
#prev:hover{
	cursor: hand;
}
#next{
	float: right;
	padding-top: 30px;
	width: 64px;
}
#next:hover{
	cursor: hand;
}

jQuery Code:

$(document).ready(function(){
	$("#slideshow").cycle({
	fx: 'fade',
	speed: 'slow',
	timeout: 5000,
	next: '#next',
	prev: '#prev'
	});
});

MUST INCLUDE PLUGINS!

If you aren’t sure how to set this up, post a comment and I’ll be glad to help.

Thanks for reading,
Sibor aka Robby

PS: I will continue to update this - slideshow - until the point it is 100% perfect!

Read full topic
